thread.title: adidas Has Restocked a Lot of Old and New Boost Sneakers to Buy Right Now
thread.title_full: adidas Has Restocked a Lot of Old and New Boost Sneakers to Buy Right Now

author: Kam Dhillon
title: adidas Has Restocked a Lot of Old and New Boost Sneakers to Buy Right Now
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
Air Max Day might be in full swing, but adidas is having some fun its own. Right now, you can go head to adidas.com and find both new and old colorways of the Ultra Boost 3.0, Ultra Boost Uncaged, NMD, Ultra Boost X, Pure Boost, EQTs, and even a new Harden Vol. 1 available to buy now.
Take a look at a few of the sneakers that have been released above and visit the adidas Boost page to see what remains. But be quick if you have the urge to cop, as these are likely to sell out fast.
So, what could explain adidas’ decision for an out-of-nowhere launch and a restock of some of its most coveted silhouettes? It can’t just be a coincidence that Nike’s Air Max Day culminates today, can it? It does look like an attempt to on adidas’ part to take some of the heat away from Air Max Day, which has grown into quite the phenomenon. 
For more hyped footwear news, here’s a detailed look at the Nike Air VaporMax in black.
